title: Finding Roots of Polynomials with the TI-84 Plus CE graphing calculator using the PLySmlt app
description: The PolySmlt2 App on your TI-84 Plus CE graphing calculator is the ideal tool for finding roots of polynomials. Let’s take a look at how to set up your calculator to use this app, which will help you save time and avoid mistakes on your big exams.

asset.author: TI Calculators
